#include "commo.h"
#include "../rcc/graph.h"
#include "../rcc/graph_marshaler.h"
#include "../command.h"
#include "../procedure.h"
#include "../command_marshaler.h"
#include "raft_rpc.h"
#include "macros.h"
#include "server.h"

namespace janus
{



  RaftCommo::RaftCommo(PollMgr *poll) : Communicator(poll)
  {
  }

  void RaftCommo::SendRequestVote(parid_t par_id,
                                  siteid_t site_id,
                                  uint64_t term,
                                  uint16_t candidateId,
                                  uint64_t lastLogIndex,
                                  uint64_t lastLogTerm,
                                  RaftServer *candidate)
  {
    /*
     * Example code for sending a single RPC to server at site_id
     * You may modify and use this function or just use it as a reference
     */
    auto proxies = rpc_par_proxies_[par_id];
    for (auto &p : proxies)
    {
      if (p.first == site_id)
      {
        RaftProxy *proxy = (RaftProxy *)p.second;
        FutureAttr fuattr;
        fuattr.callback = [candidate, site_id](Future *fu)
        {
          uint64_t retTerm;
          bool_t vote_granted;
          fu->get_reply() >> retTerm;
          fu->get_reply() >> vote_granted;
          candidate->CbRequestVote(retTerm, vote_granted, site_id);
        };


        Call_Async(proxy, RequestVote, term, candidateId, lastLogIndex, lastLogTerm, fuattr);
        // Log_info("SendRequestVote count %d", rpc_count_);
      }
    }
  }

  void RaftCommo::SendAppendEntries(parid_t par_id,
                                    siteid_t site_id,
                                    uint64_t term,
                                    uint16_t leaderId,
                                    uint64_t prevLogIndex,
                                    uint64_t prevLogTerm,
                                    MarshallDeputy mdLog,
                                    uint64_t newLogTerm,
                                    uint64_t commitIndex,
                                    RaftServer *leader)
  {
    auto proxies = rpc_par_proxies_[par_id];
    for (auto &p : proxies)
    {
      if (p.first == site_id)
      {
        RaftProxy *proxy = (RaftProxy *)p.second;
        FutureAttr fuattr;
        fuattr.callback = [leader, site_id, prevLogIndex](Future *fu)
        {
          uint64_t retTerm;
          bool_t followerAppendOK;
          fu->get_reply() >> retTerm;
          fu->get_reply() >> followerAppendOK;
          Log_debug("Entering cb from Server %d to LeaderId %d", site_id, leader->loc_id_);
          leader->CbAppendEntries(retTerm, followerAppendOK, site_id, prevLogIndex);
        };
        Call_Async(proxy, AppendEntries, term, leaderId, prevLogIndex, prevLogTerm, mdLog, newLogTerm, commitIndex, fuattr);
        // Log_info("SendAppendEntries count %d", rpc_count_);
      }
    }
  }



  void RaftCommo::SendEmptyAppendEntries(parid_t par_id,
                                         siteid_t site_id,
                                         uint64_t term,
                                         uint16_t leaderId,
                                         uint64_t prevLogIndex,
                                         uint64_t prevLogTerm,
                                         uint64_t commitIndex,
                                         RaftServer *leader)
  {
    /*
     * More example code for sending a single RPC to server at site_id
     * You may modify and use this function or just use it as a reference
     */
    auto proxies = rpc_par_proxies_[par_id];
    for (auto &p : proxies)
    {
      if (p.first == site_id)
      {
        RaftProxy *proxy = (RaftProxy *)p.second;
        FutureAttr fuattr;
        fuattr.callback = [site_id, leader, prevLogIndex](Future *fu)
        {
          uint64_t retTerm;
          bool_t followerAppendOK;
          fu->get_reply() >> retTerm;
          fu->get_reply() >> followerAppendOK;
          leader->CbEmptyAppendEntries(retTerm, followerAppendOK, site_id, prevLogIndex);
        };
        /* wrap Marshallable in a MarshallDeputy to send over RPC */
        // MarshallDeputy md(cmd);


        Call_Async(proxy, EmptyAppendEntries, term, leaderId, prevLogIndex, prevLogTerm, commitIndex, fuattr);
        // Log_info("Send EMptyAppendEntries count %d", rpc_count_);
      }
    }
  }

  shared_ptr<IntEvent>
  RaftCommo::SendString(parid_t par_id, siteid_t site_id, const string &msg, string *res)
  {
    auto proxies = rpc_par_proxies_[par_id];
    auto ev = Reactor::CreateSpEvent<IntEvent>();
    for (auto &p : proxies)
    {
      if (p.first == site_id)
      {
        RaftProxy *proxy = (RaftProxy *)p.second;
        FutureAttr fuattr;
        fuattr.callback = [res, ev](Future *fu)
        {
          fu->get_reply() >> *res;
          ev->Set(1);
        };
        /* wrap Marshallable in a MarshallDeputy to send over RPC */
        Call_Async(proxy, HelloRpc, msg, fuattr);
      }
    }
    return ev;
  }

} // namespace janus
